con:config.script:
log.info "******************************* get Search API *************************************"
//Set DOB value testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "DOB","010190" ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "DOBFORMAT","01/01/90" ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("iterationValue", "1") def iterationValue = context.expand( '${#TestCase#iterationValue}' ) log.info "Iteration Value :"+ iterationValue

con:configuration.query: select LOAN_NUM from LLOAN where LOAN_STATUS = 8 and rownum = 1

con:testStep.name: Search By Search by MCR number

con:configuration.query: select MCREF_REFERENCE from LMCREF where rownum = 1 order by A4GLidentity desc
select c.ACCT_BPMID from LACMSTR c where rownum = 1 order by c.ACCT_BPMID desc

con:config.script: def aCCT_BPMID = context.expand( '${Search by external Customer Id#ACCT_BPMID}' )

con:configuration.query: select ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_POSTCODE,ACCT_BIRTH_DATE , ACCT_CORPORATION from LACMSTR where ACCT_BPMID = '${Search by external Customer Id#ACCT_BPMID}'
select CLINK_SECONDARY from lclink where rownum = 1
select count(*) from LACMSTR c where c.ACCT_SURNAME like '%Wood%'
select acct_postcode from LACMSTR where rownum = 1
select count(*) from LACMSTR where acct_postcode = '${Search by Post Code#acct_postcode}'
select acct_number from LACMSTR where rownum = 1 order by acct_number desc

con:testStep.name: Search By Customer Number Is Corporation "Y"

con:configuration.query: select ACCT_NUMBER from LACMSTR where acct_corporation = 'Y' and rownum = 1

con:testStep.name: Search By Customer Number Is Corporation "N"

con:configuration.query: select ACCT_NUMBER from LACMSTR where acct_corporation = 'N' and rownum = 1
select ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_POSTCODE,ACCT_BIRTH_DATE , ACCT_CORPORATION from LACMSTR where ACCT_NUMBER ='${Search by Internal Customer Id#acct_number}'

con:testStep.name: Customer Id for Customer with Corp Y

con:configuration.query: select ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_POSTCODE,ACCT_BIRTH_DATE , ACCT_CORPORATION from LACMSTR where ACCT_NUMBER ='${Search By Customer Number Is Corporation "Y"#ACCT_NUMBER}'

con:testStep.name: Customer Id for Customer with Corp N

con:configuration.query: select ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_POSTCODE,ACCT_BIRTH_DATE , ACCT_CORPORATION from LACMSTR where ACCT_NUMBER ='${Search By Customer Number Is Corporation "N"#ACCT_NUMBER}'
select to_char(to_date(lpad(to_char(ACCT_BIRTH_DATE),6,'0'),'ddMMyy'),'DDMMYY') as ACCT_BIRTH_DATE from LACMSTR where ACCT_BIRTH_DATE ='90679'
select count(*) from LACMSTR where ACCT_BIRTH_DATE = '${#TestCase#DOB}'
